articles.description: Liam Livingstone is dropped three times before taking England to a series-clinching three-wicket win over West Indies in the third T20.
articles.title: England in West Indies: Tourists seal T20 series win with nervy victory

articles.description: England interim manager Lee Carsley's finest in charge send positive message to incoming coach Thomas Tuchel
articles.title: Greece v England: Carsley's finest night gives positive signs for Thomas Tuchel

articles.title: Belgium vs Italy: UEFA Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Captain Jamie George says England have "evolved" from the side beaten by South Africa in the World Cup semi-finals last year.
articles.title: England v South Africa: Jamie George says hosts have 'evolved' since World Cup defeat

articles.description: Alisson Becker's imminent return from injury means Caoimhin Kelleher's latest run in the Liverpool team might be over - so what next for a goalkeeper who 'could be one of the world's best'?
articles.title: Caoimhin Kelleher: What now for Liverpool goalkeeper as Alisson Becker nears return?

articles.title: Slovenia vs Norway: UEFA Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Emma Raducanu is expected to play for Great Britain in their Billie Jean King Cup tie against Germany on Friday.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup 2024: Emma Raducanu back as Great Britain take on Germany

articles.description: Three-time Olympic skiing medallist Lindsey Vonn is returning to the sport more than five years after retiring.
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn: American skiing great to come out of retirement aged 40

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says he would "pay to play" for Europe in the Ryder Cup in the wake of reports that American golfers will each receive $400,000 (£350,000) to compete in next year's contest.
articles.title: Ryder Cup: Rory McIlroy and Europeans will not follow US lead of paying players in New York

articles.description: Taylor Fritz boosts his hopes of reaching the last four of the ATP Finals with a comeback victory against Australia's Alex de Minaur.
articles.title: ATP Finals: Taylor Fritz beats Alex de Minaur to boost last-four hopes
